org.integratedmodelling.thinklab.api.modelling
Interface IDataset

public interface IDataset

A dataset is a persistent IContext. Should be capable of reconstructing the context it came from.

Author:
Ferdinando Villa

Method Summary
 IContext getContext()
          Return the context we represent, creating it if we were loaded from persistent storage.
 java.lang.String persist()
          Ensure we can get GC's without losing data.
 void restore(java.lang.String location)
          Read the dataset from assigned storage.
 void setContext(IContext context)
          Set the context for the dataset.
 

Method Detail

setContext

void setContext(IContext context)
                throws ThinklabException
Set the context for the dataset. If there is one, ensure compatibility of extents and merge states from it.

Parameters:
context -
Throws:
ThinklabException

persist

java.lang.String persist()
                         throws ThinklabException
Ensure we can get GC's without losing data. We should know where. Return a location we can be restored from.
